backend/main.mo: Minimal canister exposing a query healthCheck method that returns an empty response.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping spark‑burst-related features to the files they modify along with component and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in the game and visual effect system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying safe‑area padding and rendering GameScreen inside OrientationGuard.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion visual effect supporting hit, player, and bomb variants with deterministic ember placement.
frontend/src/game/effects/ObstacleSparks: Continuous spark streak and glow effect rendered on obstacles, with stronger visuals for boss obstacles.
frontend/src/game/effects/SparkBurst.tsx: Renders a radial spark burst effect with variant-based colors, sizes, and completion callback timing.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Displays a rotated bullet with glow, core gradient, and trailing effect at a given position.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Draws a scalable hexagon obstacle with glow, gradients, stripes, and optional boss visuals plus spark overlay.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Renders the player jet with optional animated thruster effects and an SVG jet body positioned and rotated in the playfield.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main gameplay loop handling movement, collisions, bullets, obstacles, scoring, explosions, and spark‑burst spawning.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useJoystickSensi: Manages joystick sensitivity state with localStorage persistence and validation.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides utilities to clamp positions, reflect velocities at bounds, and detect out-of-bounds or border contact.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Resolves elastic collisions between circular obstacles with separation, damping, clamping, and safety guards.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines whether a player–obstacle collision is a full hit by checking overlap depth relative to radii.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Provides helpers for converting angles and pixel values into normalized vectors and percent‑based position updates.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Game playfield container with border styling, corner accents, and grid overlay.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Renders the in‑game HUD, level progress, boss health, and controls based on game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Detects portrait orientation and shows a rotate‑device prompt, attempting to lock to landscape when possible.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: Implements a press‑and‑hold shoot button using pointer capture to trigger fire start/end events.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick with deadzone, clamped movement, and pointer handling to emit movement vectors.
frontend/src/game/utils/joystickMovement: Processes raw joystick input into a normalized direction and curved speed factor with deadzone and sensitivity logic.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides level duration calculation and a helper to format remaining time as a string.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and auth client setup through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that the game uses no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark arcade color schemes, game-specific utilities, and spark animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, extended theme values, plugins, and game-related color mappings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing spark particle effect features, requirements, and current project state.
